about: Scriptoria helps you publish your apps and keep them updated every time the App Builder software is improved. You provide the service with your app project data and it will build and publish the app to the Google Play store or a website.
attributions_title: Open Source Project used in Scriptoria
deletePrompt_warning:
• If a product is deleted, all related information about it, including the latest version code and paths to published files, will also be deleted.
• Deleting the specified product can't be undone.
deletePrompt_warningIfPublished:
This product has been successfully published. If the product is deleted, it could break features in the published app.
• If the BUILD_SHARE_DOWNLOAD_APP_LINK Publishing Property was set, then an Android app will have a link to the Universal APK which will fail to download.
• If the product type is an Asset Package, then a container app with a link to the package will fail to download it.
deletePrompt_label: To confirm deletion, type {sentinel} in the text input field
directory_searchHelp:
This allows you to search over:
• Project Name
• Project Language
• Owner Name
• Organization Name
• Group Name
• Package Name
invitations_orgPrompt: Like to sign up your organization?
invitations_missingTokenPrompt: Please check the link and try again
invitations_orgInviteTitle: You have been invited to create an organization!
org_logoURL_note: Note: For optimal quality use a square image
org_publicByDefaultDescription: Projects created under this organization are set to public by default
org_makePrivateDescription:
When a new project is created, it will be defaulted to Public.
      (Private projects cannot be viewed by anyone outside of your organization)
org_productSelectTitle: Select all the products you would like to make available to your organization
org_storeSelectTitle: Select all the stores you would like to make available to your organization
org_groupHasProjects: {group} is associated with at least one project and could not be deleted
org_emptyBuildEngineURL: A URL must be provided when not using the Default Build Engine
org_emptyAccessToken: An API token must be provided when not using the Default Build Engine
products_definition: Useful files that result from a series of steps.
products_noStoresAvailable: There are no stores available for the selected product. Please contact your organization administrator.
products_acts_noneAvailable: No actions are currently available for this product.
products_acts_bulkNotAllAllowed: Not all of the selected projects' products can have the {action} action(s) applied.
products_empty: You have no products for this project.
products_creationInProgress: Pending: You cannot add a product until the project setup has been completed.
profile_optOutOfEmailOption: I want to receive all email notifications
profile_emailExceptions: I want to receive notifications about...

match.option=1: New tasks that have been assigned to me
match.option=2: Background tasks that have been completed for my projects
match.option=3: Background tasks that have failed for my projects
match.option=4: Background tasks that have failed for any project in my organization
match.option=5: SuperAdmin stuff (i.e. Product Not Found, Retry with Medium Compute)

profile_visibility_visible: My profile information is publicly viewable
profile_visibility_restricted: My profile information is restricted from the public
user_ownsProjectsInGroup: {user} owns at least one project associated with {group} and could not be removed.
errors_requiredField: The {field} is required, but has no value
errors_notAuthorized: You must login. This could be due to a prior login expiring.
errors_notFoundDescription: Something went wrong and the page or resource could not be found!
errors_groupRequired: You must be a member of at least one group.
errors_userForbidden: An error occurred: Forbidden. Please contact your organization administrator.
errors_friendlyForbidden: You are not allowed to do that. Please contact your organization administrator
errors_forbiddenForAllOrgs: You are not allowed to do that. Please select an organization
errors_notAMemberOfOrg: You are not a member of that organization
errors_notactiveUserText:
This user is currently set to not active.
Please contact your organization administrator to discuss the reason for the status change.
errors_orgMembershipRequiredText:
In order to use Scriptoria, you must be a member of at least one organization.
Please contact your organization administrator to discuss receiving an invite to an organization on Scriptoria.
errors_orgMembershipChangedText:
Your organization membership has changed.
This can take a few moments to process. Please sign out, wait a minute, and then sign in again for the change to take effect.
errors_orgMustBeSelected: An organization must be selected to view this page
errors_verifyEmailDescription:
In order to use Scriptoria, we need you to verify your email address.
Please log into your email and clik the verification link.
errors_invalidProjectSelection: No valid products available for selected project(s)
tasks_noTasksTitle: No tasks are assigned to you.
tasks_noTasksDescription: Tasks that require your attention will appear here.
projectImport_success: Project Import successfully created. You will receive an email when the import is completed.
project_noAvailableGroups: There are no available groups for the selected organization
project_visibilityDescription: If you make your project Private, it will not be visible in the directory or accessible by other organizations
project_autoPublish_description: When the rebuild workflow is run, skip verification and publish the app. Send a notification to owner and reviewers that the app was published without review.
project_autoRebuild_description: When automatic rebuilds are on, Scriptoria will automatically rebuild your products when the input source is updated
project_autoRebuild_on_update_descriptio: When the App Builder software used by Scriptoria is updated, rebuild the products of the project that have completed the initial workflow and are not currently being rebuilt.
project_orgDownloads_description: When this setting is on, any Scriptoria User that is able to view your project in the Directory will be able to download the Product Files (the outputs of the products).
project_visibility_description: Public Projects allow any Scriptoria User to view your project in the Directory
project_acts_archive_error: There was an error trying to archive the project
project_acts_reactivate_error: There was an error trying to reactivate the project
project_acts_autoBuilds_error: Error: We could not change automatic build status
project_acts_downloads_error: Error: We could not change Allow Download status
project_acts_autoPublish_error: Error: We could not change Auto Publish status
project_acts_isPublic_on: Project visibility is set to Public
project_acts_isPublic_off: Project visibility is set to Private
project_acts_isPublic_error: Error: We could not change Project visibility
projectTable_noProducts: This project has no configured products
users_noneFound: No users matching the selected criteria were found.
users_acts_lock_success: User is locked. A locked user will not be able to log in to Scriptoria.
users_acts_lock_error: There was an error locking the user
users_acts_unlock_success: User is active. The user will now be able to log in to Scriptoria.
users_acts_unlock_error: there was an error activating the user
stores_gpTitleEmpty: Google Play Owner Name cannot be empty
flowDefs_enabledDescription: Workflow definitions may not be used until enabled.
flowDefs_emptyStoreType: Need to select a store type for this workflow definition
flowDefs_emptyType: Need to select a workflow type for this workflow definition
flowDefs_emptyProductType: Need to select a product type for this workflow definition

match.option=1: Require an organization admin to access the GooglePlay developer console.
match.option=2: Require approval by an organization admin before product is created.

prodDefs_emptyType: Need to select an Application Type
prodDefs_emptyFlow: Need to select a Workflow definition
stores_emptyStoreType: Need to select a store type for this store
storeTypes_emptyType: Need to select an Application Type
storeTypes_emptyFlow: Need to select a Workflow definition
orgMembership_invalid: We've received an invalid response... please refresh the page to try again.
orgMembership_error: Error occured while trying to invite user.
system_unavailable: Scriptoria is currently unable to process background tasks
